name: Dine & Dash (Alikay)
description:
You are a chef, but instead of a pantry you have a dungeon! You have to keep up with incoming orders and dash between the kitchen and the dungeon, where you gather ingrediants.  Explore procedurally generated dungeons, and use their loot for your cooking! You can use your own ingrediants for a burst of speed, but be careful! You have to remember to manage your resources!

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Aim Weapon: Mouse
  • Attack: Left Click
  • DASH: Left Shift
  • View dish ingrediants: hover mouse over icon
  • Make dish: Left Click on the dish icon, while standing near the oven

Made for the University of Alberta Games Den Quick Game Jam

Diversifiers:

  • Language Independance
  • Provided Asset Pack
  • PCG
